name: Short Scary Stories
description:
Story
Robert, a security guard in a mental hospital, wakes up to a stormy day.A weird storm...
When he wakes up he sees everyone turn into zombies.he must try to reach a safe place and find out the cause of the outbreak.he will gradually learn the truth during the journey.

Gameplay
Short Scary Stories is a standart FPS game.There is a story that progresses chapter by chapter.
Your ammunition is limited so you must be careful.Also weapon types are limited too.
